Articles.Content:
Windows 32 Steam carreer custom

error is random

Starting with -1000 reputation, build craft, launch and if mouse over the stats and reputation indicates 0 and remains.

craft is mk-1 command module

fixed by returning to space centre

Error also happens after at various times with differant reputation and crafts. But the reputation slider bar indicates 0 at launchpad upon exiting from VAB using launch button. This can happen quite often, using these settings, let me know if you want the log files. I will try the 32 bit right now.

After starting new carreer in win 32. Error is still random. In the screenshots it happens after the second launch. Saved both log files and will upload shortly. Log & Output

Edited October 14, 2014 by MoeslyArmlis
Win 32 added log files
